duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and inside sales support, including verifying purchase order pricing, coordinating logistics, and providing shipping and inventory status.
Participate in customer calls, track and follow up on sales deliverables, develop customer relationships, and make customer outreach.
Coordinate and manage client expectations, work efficiently, and provide information to customers in a concise and customer-friendly manner.
Develop sales plans, goals, and perform daily outbound calling and email prospecting to both existing customers and new prospects.
Establish and grow the inside sales team for outbound prospecting and develop product knowledge to effectively answer customer product questions.
Investigate warranty and defective product claims, identify new or updated products to be added to customer catalogs, and coordinate with Marketing to make those additions/updates.

Lead sales outreach with follow-up products to existing customers via email, phone, and video conferencing, provide alternative solutions if inventory availability does not correspond with a client requirement.
Participate in virtual client meetings, with the majority being virtual but occasional in-person meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business or related field.
